hero.title: Welcome to Birkmayer Aerospace
hero.subtitle: Innovative solutions for your aerospace projects.

about.title: Aerospace & Highly Regulated Industries – Delivering Safe, Reliable and Market-Ready Products
about.text: Companies in highly regulated industries face pressure: more innovation, shorter development cycles, stricter certification. I support organizations in accelerating product development, engineering, and industrialization—faster, safer, and more efficient. Operationally, as coach and at executive level, I deliver measurable improvements in time-to-market, delivery reliability, product dependability, and total cost of ownership—ensuring compliance, resilience, and sustainable technological leadership.
